クーポンコードが有効かどうかを検証します。


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["couponCode"],"properties":{"couponCode":{"type":"string","description":"クーポンコード","example":"WELCOME10"},"cartTotal":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"カート合計金額","example":10000}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
